articles.author: Jack Guy, Antonia Mortensen and Mick Krever, CNN
articles.title: Denmark rolls back order for mink cull amid legal dispute
articles.description: The Danish government has backtracked on an order to cull the country's entire mink population after realizing it had no legal authority to mandate the killing of mink on farms unaffected by coronavirus.
